about_the_game:
To Clean The Mountain is a platforming adventure where you throw yourself towards the summit. The spirit of the mountain will talk with you as you traverse a variety of environments.


Environments
Handcrafted levels based on a variety of mountainous landscapes. Each environment features unique mechanics for you to interact with and learn, combining the interesting platforming elements with puzzle solving.


The Mountain
Elements of the world change based on how you assist the mountain. The game is completable regardless of your choices, but the difficulty is up to you.


Demo
The demo features the first of 6 environments in the world with none of the story elements. See how you enjoy the mechanics and feel free to give us any suggestions for future development

short_description: To Clean The Mountain is a platformer where you traverse a mountainous environment by flinging yourself with a trash bag. Enjoy the open environment without guardrails as you persevere towards the summit.
